about_the_game:
Play as Lefty and Righty!
In this playful and wholesome adventure, all the plushies in the day-care have gone missing! You get to play as the hands of each kid searching for their furry friends in their own fantasy worlds. Can you find out who or what caused this strange event? Jump, fall, grab and high-five your way through six worlds filled with puzzles, secrets, challenges, minigames and hats!

  • All Hands on Deck!
    Experience a playful adventure where you and a friend lend each other a hand. Whether you choose to play it, locally or with Remote play together**, you can experience All Hands on Deck with keyboard or with controllers. All that without using split-screen!
  • Handy co-op tools!
    Various tools can be found across the playful worlds, like an extendable arm to reach higher places or a rubber band to become a slingshot together and many more. Most items can even be combined with others! Use these tools to solve light puzzles and save all the missing plushies!
  • Customisation is at your fingertips!
    Many secrets, cosmetics and additional challenges are spread throughout each world. Buy cosmetics and jump on paint tubes to change your appearances. Can you find them all?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7 SP1 / 8.1 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: i3 Sandy Bridge Dual Core or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7 SP1 / 8.1 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: i5 Sandy Bridge Dual Core or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended

short_description: All Hands on Deck is a co-op puzzle adventure game. Combine and use various items together to solve puzzles, progress through playful worlds full of toys and save plushies. In All Hands on Deck, all can experience the same! Just swap items and you're good to go. How handy is that!
